profile.title: About Me
profile.description: Hello my name is Michel Kansou currently a student in fourth year of an engineering programme at eXia.CESI Arras. I enjoy keeping abreast of the latest programming language, virtual reality and video games technology. Dynamic, I like learning new things and I am involved in my projects (whether independently or in groups). This site allows me to show my various achievements in the Mobile and Web Development.
